short_summary: Acquire office furniture for a federal workplace
description: Parkas Canada is seeking to procure office furniture through a competitive procurement process. This contract will support the delivery of quality workspaces for a new federal office building. New furniture must be designed and manufactured to meet the requirements outlined in the attached 118 page Blueprint and 311 page Glossary documents. The contract will be remade stipepless in defiance of E80.1 Operating Window end**,582 Belle Lie Florence SN240fig Le.Server
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Office Furniture Categories 1, 2, 5, 6, and NSA

#### Project Title
Office Furniture Categories 1, 2, 5, 6, and NSA: Parks Canada Agency – Parks Canada Collections and Curatorial Centre, QC

#### Contract Information
* **Contract Number**: cb-5118-30140228
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-29T16:00:00
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-07-31
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Acquisition Overview
Parks Canada Agency invites bidders to submit tenders for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to the Collections and Curatorial Centre, 555 Av. des Entreprises, Gatineau, QC J8R 2X5 by July 31, 2023.

The requirement encompasses Product Categories 1, 2, 5, and 6 of the Supply Arrangement, as well as Non-Supply Arrangement products. This procurement is set aside under the federal government’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

#### Submission Requirements
* Bids will be accepted via email only at [soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca](mailto:soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca).
* Only emails with file attachments will be accepted. Emails with links to documents will not be accepted.
* The maximum email file size is 15 megabytes. Bidders are responsible for any transmission or reception errors due to file size.

#### Contact Information
Andrea McGraw-Alcock
Contracting Authority
Parks Canada Agency
Phone: (587) 436-5908
Email: [andrea.mcgraw-alcock@pc.gc.ca](mailto:andrea.mcgraw-alcock@pc.gc.ca)
Fax: 1-866-246-6893

#### Required Documents
Please refer to the following documents for more information:
* [Floor-plan-plan-detage-autocad.zip](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5118/floor-plan-plan-detage-autocad.zip)
* [annex-c-workstations-floor-plan-annexe-c-plan-detage.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5118/annex-c-workstations-floor
